descriptionHtml:
A follower I made today for my boyfriend, only took a few hours. She should have a new weapon with her, though I'm not entirely sure because.. I don't know how to do that. She will have leather armor, her own bow, arrows, and some money for you. Because we all know we take our followers gold when they join us. She'll be at the steps of the Skyforge sense that's the only place Creation Kit wasn't being weird. Feel free to download It If you want but I'm probably not going to change her for anyone unless there's a glitch that needs to be fixed. If there are any problems though, feel free to tell me. This is the first mod I've ever published so take it easy on me. If you have tips, I'll gladly take them. Oh and, feel free to upload screen shots you take of her if you use her. I might make a follower for people who ask, so go ahead and give it a go.

Reccomended Mods:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49069/?

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/?
author: DartDovahkin
